name: Avoid the Asteroids!
description:
This is a simple game! Just don't get hit by those asteroids coming from space!

AD/left arrow, right arrow to move left and right. Space to jump which is not always useful!

Also, there are some buffs in the game which is

  • Speed
  • Jump Boost
  • A shield that protects you from asteroids

But this buff lasts only 10 seconds.
